description: Encrypted stock market data from Numerai hedge fund tournament. Features are cleaned, regularized and encrypted global equity data with anonymized feature names. Part of Numerai's crowd-sourced hedge fund competition.

creator.name: Numerai
creator.note: Features are encrypted/anonymized for proprietary reasons

feature_description.feature1_to_feature21: 21 anonymized features representing cleaned and regularized global equity market data
feature_description.note: Feature meanings are intentionally obscured as part of the tournament design

use_case: Quantitative trading, market prediction, crowd-sourced hedge fund strategies, financial machine learning

competition_context.goal: Build models to predict market movements
competition_context.approach: Crowd-sourced data science for hedge fund trading
competition_context.encryption: Features encrypted to prevent reverse engineering while maintaining predictive relationships

preprocessing: Data is pre-cleaned, regularized, and encrypted by Numerai
performance_considerations: Cannot interpret features directly, must rely on statistical patterns
advantages: Real financial data, large dataset, professionally cleaned, unique crowd-sourcing approach
challenges: Feature interpretation impossible, black-box modeling only, proprietary nature
research_applications: Financial prediction, ensemble methods, feature engineering on encrypted data, transfer learning
ethical_considerations: Part of innovative crowd-sourced hedge fund model, democratizing quantitative finance

citations.title: Encrypted Stock Market Training Data from Numerai

original_source.creator: Numerai
original_source.publication: Unknown: Encrypted Stock Market Training Data from Numerai

columns.name: feature1_to_feature21
columns.semantic_description: 21 anonymized features representing cleaned and regularized global equity market data

columns.name: note
columns.semantic_description: Feature meanings are intentionally obscured as part of the tournament design
